Name: SpringHill Suites Newark Liberty International Airport
Description: Modern all-suite lodging with kitchenettes & an indoor pool, plus free breakfast & airport shuttle.

Name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Newark Liberty International Airport
Description: No-nonsense hotel with an indoor pool & a gym, plus free Wi-Fi, hot breakfast & an airport shuttle.

Name: Cambria Hotel West Orange
Description: Simple rooms & suites in a low-key hotel with a 24/7 gym & an indoor pool, plus a restaurant/bar.

Name: TRYP by Wyndham Newark Downtown
Description: Bright rooms, some with exercise bikes, in a trendy hotel with a free airport shuttle & a gastropub.

Name: Renaissance Newark Airport Hotel
Description: Warm quarters offering a free airport shuttle, plus European dining, a bar & a fitness center.
